<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120223</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kateri opazovalni sistem  je inercialen?</string>
            <string language="en">Which is an inertial frame?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welches ist ein Trägheitsfeld?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelle est une trame à inertie ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Qual é um frame inertial?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quale è una struttura inerziale?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όποιο είναι ένα αδρανές πλαίσιο;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es un marco de inercia?</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Demonstracija treh meritev istega gibanja iz inercialnih in neinercialnem  sistemov.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of three measurements of same motion done in different (inertial and noninertial) reference frames.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">inercialni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">inertial system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">opazovalni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">reference frame</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration von drei Messen der gleichen Bewegung 
erfolgt in den unterschiedlichen (Trägheits- und noninertial) 
Bezugsfeldern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de trois mesures du même mouvement fait 
dans différentes trames (à inertie et noninertial) de référence.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração de três medidas do mesmo movimento feito 
em frames (inertial e noninertial) diferentes da referência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una dimostrazione di tre misure dello stesso movimento 
fatto nei telai (inerziali e noninertial) differenti di riferimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη τριών μετρήσεων της ίδιας κίνησης που 
γίνονται στα διαφορετικά (αδρανή και noninertial) πλαίσια 
αναφοράς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración de tres medidas del mismo movimiento hecho 
en diversos marcos (de inercia y noninertial) de la referencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trägheitssystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezugsfeld</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système à inertie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trame de référence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema inertial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">frame da referência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema inerziale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura di riferimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αδρανές σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πλαίσιο αναφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema de inercia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">marco de la referencia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
